thread.title: Angelina and Brad Present: Relationship Goals
thread.title_full: Angelina and Brad Present: Relationship Goals -- The Cut

author: Allison P. Davis
title: Angelina and Brad Present: Relationship Goals
text: Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt collaborated on a husband-and-wife project called By the Sea, a movie she wrote, directed, and co-starred in alongside Brad. In advance of the movie's November release, the couple shared a little behind-the-scenes trailer showing us that, yes, a relationship where you can create together is wonderful. Also, that the best sorts of relationships look like this: gloriously sexy, messy, drunken romps complete with fake lashes, white silk outfits, and trips to seaside resorts in France. File this whole thing under Elizabeth Taylor–and–Richard Burton–level relationship goals.
